name: Environment Info
author: PALASTHOTEL by Edward

sections.description:
Show environmental info on your admin bar so you will never accidentally edit production site contents instead of stage or the other way around.

Arbitrary section

There’s a documentation at https://github.com/palasthotel/wp-environment-info
sections.installation:
1. Upload environment-info.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Extract the Plugin to a environment-info Folder
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. You can provide settings in the wp-config.php file
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

  • Bufix: Removed a fatal error caused by wrong hook

1.1.0

  • Feature: Identify environment by hostname
  • Feature: Tool page with overview of all defined environments

1.0.0

  • Submitted to wordpress.org plugin repo version
